text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, [hangome ki az pajomʙar ʙaroi darki ojoti Qur'on darxosti muhlat mekuned] nagued: "Ro'ino" [Zero ta'ʙiri mazkur ilova ʙar ma'noi asli mafhumi tavhinomeze hamguni "nodoni"-ro ʙa zehn merasonad], ʙalki ʙigued: "Unzurno" [kame ʙa mo fursat ʙideh] va [on goh ʙa ojoti Qur'on] gus kuned va [jaqin ʙidoned, ki] kofiron [va tamasxurkunandagoni pajomʙar] azoʙi dardnok [dar pes] dorand
